site.name: Modern Business
site.description: A professional modern business website template

features.title: Modern Technology
features.description: Built with the latest technologies and frameworks for optimal performance.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Fully responsive layouts that look great on any device or screen size.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.description: Built with SEO best practices to help your site rank better.

quote.text: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

services.title: Personal Training
services.shortDescription: One-on-one training sessions customized to your fitness goals and abilities.

features.title: Customized Workouts
features.description: Training programs tailored to your specific goals and fitness level.

features.title: Expert Guidance
features.description: Work directly with certified personal trainers who are passionate about your success.

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Regular assessments and detailed progress tracking to keep you motivated.

quote.text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quote.author: Anonymous

services.title: Group Classes
services.shortDescription: High-energy group fitness classes led by expert instructors in various disciplines.

features.title: Varied Programs
features.description: Choose from a wide range of classes including HIIT, yoga, spinning, and more.

features.title: Community Spirit
features.description: Work out in a motivating group environment with like-minded individuals.

features.title: Flexible Schedule
features.description: Multiple class times throughout the day to fit your busy lifestyle.

quote.text: Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success.
quote.author: Henry Ford

services.title: Nutrition Coaching
services.shortDescription: Expert nutrition guidance to complement your fitness journey and maximize results.

features.title: Personalized Meal Plans
features.description: Custom nutrition plans designed around your lifestyle, preferences and goals.

features.title: Nutritional Education
features.description: Learn the fundamentals of healthy eating and sustainable dietary habits.

features.title: Ongoing Support
features.description: Regular check-ins and adjustments to keep you on track with your nutrition goals.

quote.text: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
quote.author: Hippocrates

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building Stronger Bodies, Building Better Lives

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide an inclusive, supportive environment where individuals of all fitness levels can achieve their health and wellness goals through expert guidance and state-of-the-art facilities.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2015, we began with a simple vision: to create a fitness center that puts people first. What started as a small personal training studio has grown into a comprehensive fitness facility that maintains the personal touch we're known for.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from our training programs to our facility maintenance.

values.title: Community
values.description: We foster a supportive community where everyone feels welcome and motivated.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously evolve our methods and equipment to provide the best fitness experience.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you start your fitness journey
contact.description: Have questions about our services or ready to begin your fitness journey? Reach out to us and our team will be happy to assist you.
